title: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 states custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299: The Servlet 3.0 specification in chapter 7.1.1 claims that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting, but this is not true for the current trunk implementation. The default 'jsessionid' is used instead. I will attach a war file that reproduces the issue.
OB: The current Servlet 3.0 implementation does not use the custom cookie name for URL rewriting, instead it uses the default 'jsessionid'.
EB: The Servlet 3.0 implementation should use the custom cookie name specified by the user for URL rewriting.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Deploy the attached 'cookiename.war' file. 2. Access 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'.
